amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the expenditure of funds in contravention of the existing federal law that bars state and local "sanctuary" policies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
